articleParts.text: There is a number of ways you can manipulate your layers when editing ships or weapons. You can drag, rotate, and quickly switch between them.
1. Press SHIFT, hold left mouse button and drag to drag a selected layer around.
2. Press SHIFT, hold right mouse button and drag to rotate selected layer.
3. Press ALT to select a layer, sprite center of which is the closest to the mouse cursor.
1. There are two point selection modes supported: closest and strict. When in closest selection mode, closest point to the mouse cursor will be selected with every mouse motion.
2. Hold CTRL when moving the mouse to prevent point reselection when in closest selection mode.
3. Hold left mouse button and drag to move selected point.
